replies.body:
Any reasons why you think they're better other thank they're trendy? xd


I dunno, in my opinion they're all mainly the same thing every time just getting bigger, thinner, and don't seem to really be getting any update. Also, from experience, I've noticed that if you update an old device too much it literally becomes useless. Keyboard types like an idiot and has a mind of its own, taps don't register, etc.

replies.body:
Apple computers suck.
OS X doesn't suck.
iOS devices generally don't suck.
iOS sucks.

Basically they make half good products (or half-bad, too), however, Android is love and full of flowers, and most terminals do too. Cheaper and good both software and hardware, together.

and it isn't proprietary software!!
